text: The following is a list of notable machinima-related events in the year 2004. ==Events== *March 11 – The ILL Clan co-hosted the Florida Film Festival using their characters Lenny and Larry Lumberjack.Marino, 23. *March 16 – Epic Games released its first-person shooter (FPS) computer game Unreal Tournament 2004.Unreal Tournament 2004 for PC review. *November 9 – Bungie releasedGameSpy: Halo 2. its FPS video game Halo 2, which is used in multiple machinima series. *November 16 – Valve released its FPS computer game Half- Life 2.GameSpy: Half-Life 2. ==Notable releases== *January 3 – of Rooster Teeth Productions' Red vs. Blue began with the premiere of episode 20 at the Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts. *July 11 – Season 2 of Red vs. Blue ended with episode 38.Red vs. Blue: Episode 38. *October 18 – Rooster Teeth Productions released the first episode of its new series, The Strangerhood.Go Here. *November 28 – GW Films and Chipmunk Ninjas collaborated to make the popular film ClanWars.CS-Nation: Clanwars Released ==Active series== *Fire Team Charlie (2003–2005) *Decisive Battles (2004) *Lenny & Larry on the Campaign Trail (2004) *Neverending Nights (premiered 2004) *Red vs. Blue (2003–2007) *The Strangerhood (2004–2006) *Time Commanders (2003–2005) ==Awards== ===Rockets on Prisoner=== *Best Movie: Fire Team Charlie episode 133rd Annual "Rockets on Prisoner" Awards: History. ==Notes== ==References== * * * * * * * * Machinima Category:Machinima by year
title: 2004 in machinima
